page.title: 04Rowen Nursery (June to Dec)
page.content: {June}is slighty easier.The chrysanthemums which are bought as cuttings are planted out,next year's primroses are sown. In{July}this continues and Autumn bedding and rock plants are sown.Towards the end of the month the Kennetts manage a holiday,although someone has to stay to water and shade the growing plants. During{August}the Cinearia are sown,rock plants pricked out and the staff have their holiday.{September} brings the selling of chrysanthemums (blooms)and bedding plants.In{October boxes and pots are bought for next year(about a 100,000 pots)and the soil is bought for next year.{November}sees the sale of chrysanthemums and cyclamen and finally the rush up to {Christmas}in{December.} {
